title: France panorama. [No. 72/17]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Snow/ice sculpture in the Pyranees. 2. French experiment for NASA. 3. Celebration outside Paris for the 2500th anniversary of Iran/Persia. 4. Max Ernst (painter) at the Orangene. 5. Pierre Cochereau (organist) and Roger Helmatto (trumpeter) at Notre Dame.
